flavor: You were a member of the clergy of a different deity, but something made you change your allegiance. What deity did you worship before? Was it an evil god or some false idol? Did some tragedy or miracle drive you to follow another god? Did you lose faith in your previous deity for some reason, or did you walk away from that life due to more worldly concerns? Did you meet someone who changed your mind? Do your old allies wish you well, or do they want you back?
name: Convert
